title: SLOTH mmCIF Nested JSON Schema
description: Structural schema for nested JSON format produced by SLOTH exporter. Validates only JSON structure/topology, not mmCIF content semantics. Content validation is handled by PDBML XSD schema.

additionalProperties.description: Each property represents an mmCIF category (e.g., 'entity', 'atom_site', 'citation')

items.description: Each item represents one row/instance of the category

additionalProperties.description: mmCIF item values or nested child categories

oneOf.description: Regular mmCIF item value (all values are strings in mmCIF)
Nested child category containing related items

^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: mmCIF category names follow this pattern
